   168â†’        // å­—ä½“å®šä¹‰
   169â†’        let titleFont = UIFont.systemFont(ofSize: titleFontSize, weight: .medium)
   170â†’        let lineFont = UIFont.systemFont(ofSize: lineFontSize, weight: .regular)
   171â†’        
   172â†’        // è·å–æ°´å°å†…å®¹
   173â†’        let watermarkContent = buildWatermarkContent(settings: settings, captureSettings: captureSettings)
   174â†’        
   175â†’        // è®¡ç®—æ€»é«˜åº¦
   176â†’        var totalHeight: CGFloat = 0
   177â†’        var lineHeights: [CGFloat] = []
   178â†’        
   179â†’        if settings.showLogoLine && settings.selectedLogo != .none {
   180â†’            lineHeights.append(logoSize)
   181â†’            totalHeight += logoSize + lineSpacing
   182â†’        }
   183â†’        
   184â†’        for content in watermarkContent {
   185â†’            if !content.isEmpty {
   186â†’                let font = content == watermarkContent.first ? titleFont : lineFont
   187â†’                lineHeights.append(font.lineHeight)
   188â†’                totalHeight += font.lineHeight + lineSpacing
   189â†’            }
   190â†’        }
   191â†’        
   192â†’        if totalHeight > 0 {
   193â†’            totalHeight -= lineSpacing // ç§»é™¤æœ€åä¸€ä¸ªé—´è·
   194â†’        }
   195â†’        
   196â†’        // ğŸ¨ åŠ¨æ€å¸ƒå±€ï¼šå½“Logoå’Œä¿¡æ¯åˆ†åˆ«ä½äºå·¦å³æ—¶ï¼Œå„è‡ªå‚ç›´å±…ä¸­
   197â†’        let centerX = effectiveRect.midX
   198â†’        let leftX = effectiveRect.minX + baseSize * 0.05
   199â†’        let rightX = effectiveRect.maxX - baseSize * 0.05
   200â†’        
   201â†’        // ğŸš€ æ£€æŸ¥æ˜¯å¦éœ€è¦å·¦å³åˆ†å¸ƒå¸ƒå±€
   202â†’        let isLeftRightLayout = (settings.logoPosition == .left && settings.infoPosition == .right) ||
   203â†’                               (settings.logoPosition == .right && settings.infoPosition == .left)
   204â†’        
   205â†’        let startY: CGFloat
   206â†’        if isLeftRightLayout {
   207â†’            // å·¦å³åˆ†å¸ƒæ—¶ï¼šLogoå’Œä¿¡æ¯å„è‡ªå‚ç›´å±…ä¸­äºåº•éƒ¨åŒºåŸŸ
   208â†’            let availableHeight = bottomPadding * 2  // å¯ç”¨çš„å‚ç›´ç©ºé—´
   209â†’            startY = effectiveRect.maxY - bottomPadding - availableHeight / 2
   210â†’        } else {
   211â†’            // å…¶ä»–å¸ƒå±€ï¼šç»Ÿä¸€ä½¿ç”¨åº•éƒ¨å¯¹é½
   212â†’            startY = effectiveRect.maxY - bottomPadding - totalHeight
   213â†’        }
   214â†’        
   215â†’        var currentY = startY
   216â†’        var lineIndex = 0
   217â†’        
   218â†’        // ğŸ¯ è®¡ç®—ç»Ÿä¸€çš„ä¸­å¿ƒçº¿Yåæ ‡ï¼ˆåœ¨Logoå’Œä¿¡æ¯ç»˜åˆ¶ä¹‹å‰ï¼‰
   219â†’        let centerLineY = effectiveRect.maxY - bottomPadding / 2
   220â†’        
   221â†’        // ç»˜åˆ¶Logoè¡Œ
   222â†’        if settings.showLogoLine && settings.selectedLogo != .none {
   223â†’            if let logoImage = LogoManager.shared.loadLogo(settings.selectedLogo) {
   224â†’                // ğŸ”§ ä¿®å¤ï¼šä¿æŒLogoçš„çœŸå®å®½é«˜æ¯”ï¼Œå›ºå®šé«˜åº¦ï¼ŒæŒ‰æ¯”ä¾‹è°ƒæ•´å®½åº¦
   225â†’                let logoHeight = logoSize // å›ºå®šé«˜åº¦
   226â†’                let logoAspectRatio = logoImage.size.width / logoImage.size.height
   227â†’                let logoWidth = logoHeight * logoAspectRatio // æŒ‰æ¯”ä¾‹è®¡ç®—å®½åº¦
   228â†’                
   229â†’                // ğŸ¨ ä½¿ç”¨æ–°çš„Logoä½ç½®è®¾ç½®
   230â†’                let logoX: CGFloat
   231â†’                switch settings.logoPosition {
   232â†’                case .left:
   233â†’                    logoX = leftX
   234â†’                case .right:
   235â†’                    logoX = rightX - logoWidth // ä½¿ç”¨å®é™…è®¡ç®—çš„å®½åº¦
   236â†’                case .center:
   237â†’                    logoX = centerX - logoWidth / 2 // ä½¿ç”¨å®é™…è®¡ç®—çš„å®½åº¦
   238â†’                }
   239â†’                
   240â†’                // ğŸš€ Logo Yä½ç½®ï¼šå·¦å³åˆ†å¸ƒæ—¶åŸºäºç»Ÿä¸€ä¸­å¿ƒçº¿ï¼Œå…¶ä»–æƒ…å†µæŒ‰åºæ’åˆ—
   241â†’                let logoY: CGFloat
   242â†’                if isLeftRightLayout {
   243â†’                    // ğŸ¯ å…³é”®ä¿®å¤ï¼šLogoä¸­å¿ƒå¯¹é½åˆ°ç»Ÿä¸€ä¸­å¿ƒçº¿
   244â†’                    // Logoçš„ä¸­å¿ƒY = ç»Ÿä¸€ä¸­å¿ƒçº¿Yï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥Logoèµ·å§‹Y = ä¸­å¿ƒçº¿Y - Logoé«˜åº¦/2
   245â†’                    logoY = centerLineY - logoHeight / 2
   246â†’                } else {
   247â†’                    // å…¶ä»–å¸ƒå±€ï¼šæŒ‰åºæ’åˆ—
   248â†’                    logoY = currentY
   249â†’                }
   250â†’                
   251â†’                let logoRect = CGRect(
   252â†’                    x: logoX,
   253â†’                    y: logoY,
   254â†’                    width: logoWidth, // ä½¿ç”¨æŒ‰æ¯”ä¾‹è®¡ç®—çš„å®½åº¦
   255â†’                    height: logoHeight // ä½¿ç”¨å›ºå®šé«˜åº¦
   256â†’                )
   257â†’                logoImage.draw(in: logoRect)
   258â†’                
   259â†’                // è®¡ç®—Logoçš„ä¸­å¿ƒYåæ ‡ï¼ˆç”¨äºéªŒè¯ï¼‰
   260â†’                let logoCenterY = logoY + logoHeight / 2
   261â†’                
   262â†’                print("  ğŸ¨ Logoç»˜åˆ¶: ä½ç½®=\(settings.logoPosition.displayName), å¸ƒå±€=\(isLeftRightLayout ? "å·¦å³åˆ†å¸ƒ" : "ç»Ÿä¸€å¸ƒå±€")")
   263â†’                print("    - å›¾åƒåŒºåŸŸ: é«˜åº¦=\(effectiveRect.height), YèŒƒå›´=\(effectiveRect.minY)~\(effectiveRect.maxY)")
   264â†’                print("    - åº•éƒ¨è¾¹è·: \(bottomPadding), ç»Ÿä¸€ä¸­å¿ƒçº¿Y: \(centerLineY)")
   265â†’                print("    - Logoé«˜åº¦: \(logoHeight), Logoèµ·å§‹Y: \(logoY)")
   266â†’                print("    - Logoä¸­å¿ƒY: \(logoCenterY) (åº”è¯¥ç­‰äºç»Ÿä¸€ä¸­å¿ƒçº¿: \(centerLineY))")
   267â†’                print("    - Logoå°ºå¯¸: åŸå§‹=\(logoImage.size) -> æ¸²æŸ“=\(logoRect.size)")
   268â†’            } else {
   269â†’                print("  âš ï¸ LogoåŠ è½½å¤±è´¥: \(settings.selectedLogo)")
   270â†’            }
   271â†’            
   272â†’            if !isLeftRightLayout {
   273â†’                currentY += lineHeights[lineIndex] + lineSpacing
   274â†’            }
   275â†’            lineIndex += 1
   276â†’        }
   277â†’        
   278â†’        // ç»˜åˆ¶æ–‡å­—è¡Œ
   279â†’        if isLeftRightLayout {
   280â†’            // ğŸš€ å·¦å³åˆ†å¸ƒå¸ƒå±€ï¼šè®¡ç®—ç»Ÿä¸€çš„ä¸­å¿ƒçº¿ï¼Œè®©Logoå’Œä¿¡æ¯éƒ½åŸºäºè¿™ä¸ªä¸­å¿ƒçº¿å¯¹é½
   281â†’            let allTextContent = watermarkContent.filter { !$0.isEmpty }
   282â†’            if !allTextContent.isEmpty {
   283â†’                // è®¡ç®—æ‰€æœ‰æ–‡å­—çš„æ€»é«˜åº¦
   284â†’                var totalTextHeight: CGFloat = 0
   285â†’                for content in allTextContent {
   286â†’                    let font = content == allTextContent.first ? titleFont : lineFont
   287â†’                    totalTextHeight += font.lineHeight
   288â†’                    if content != allTextContent.last {
   289â†’                        totalTextHeight += lineSpacing
   290â†’                    }
   291â†’                }
   292â†’                
   293â†’                // ğŸ¯ å…³é”®ä¿®å¤ï¼šè®¡ç®—ç»Ÿä¸€çš„ä¸­å¿ƒçº¿Yåæ ‡
   294â†’                // åº•éƒ¨åŒºåŸŸä¸­å¿ƒçº¿ = åº•éƒ¨åŒºåŸŸçš„å‚ç›´ä¸­å¿ƒ
   295â†’                let centerLineY = effectiveRect.maxY - bottomPadding / 2
   296â†’                
   297â†’                // ä¿¡æ¯æ–‡å­—å—ä»ä¸­å¿ƒçº¿å‘ä¸Šåç§»ä¸€åŠé«˜åº¦å¼€å§‹ç»˜åˆ¶
   298â†’                let textStartY = centerLineY - totalTextHeight / 2
   299â†’                var textCurrentY = textStartY
   300â†’                
   301â†’                // ç»˜åˆ¶æ‰€æœ‰ä¿¡æ¯æ–‡å­—
   302â†’                for content in allTextContent {
   303â†’                    let font = content == allTextContent.first ? titleFont : lineFont
   304â†’                    let textSize = content.size(withAttributes: [.font: font])
   305â†’                    
   306â†’                    // ğŸ¨ ä½¿ç”¨æ–°çš„ä¿¡æ¯ä½ç½®è®¾ç½®
   307â†’                    let textX: CGFloat
   308â†’                    switch settings.infoPosition {
   309â†’                    case .left:
   310â†’                        textX = leftX
   311â†’                    case .right:
   312â†’                        textX = rightX - textSize.width
   313â†’                    case .center:
   314â†’                        textX = centerX - textSize.width / 2
   315â†’                    }
   316â†’                    
   317â†’                    drawTextWithShadow(content, 
   318â†’                                     font: font, 
   319â†’                                     at: CGPoint(x: textX, y: textCurrentY), 
   320â†’                                     in: context)
   321â†’                    
   322â†’                    textCurrentY += font.lineHeight + lineSpacing
   323â†’                }
   324â†’                
   325â†’                // è®¡ç®—ä¿¡æ¯æ–‡å­—çš„ä¸­å¿ƒYåæ ‡ï¼ˆç”¨äºéªŒè¯ï¼‰
   326â†’                let textCenterY = textStartY + totalTextHeight / 2
   327â†’                
   328â†’                print("  ğŸ¨ ä¿¡æ¯ç»˜åˆ¶: ä½ç½®=\(settings.infoPosition.displayName), å¸ƒå±€=å·¦å³åˆ†å¸ƒ")
   329â†’                print("    - å›¾åƒåŒºåŸŸ: é«˜åº¦=\(effectiveRect.height), YèŒƒå›´=\(effectiveRect.minY)~\(effectiveRect.maxY)")
   330â†’                print("    - åº•éƒ¨è¾¹è·: \(bottomPadding), ç»Ÿä¸€ä¸­å¿ƒçº¿Y: \(centerLineY)")
   331â†’                print("    - æ–‡å­—æ€»é«˜åº¦: \(totalTextHeight), æ–‡å­—èµ·å§‹Y: \(textStartY)")
   332â†’                print("    - æ–‡å­—ä¸­å¿ƒY: \(textCenterY) (åº”è¯¥ç­‰äºç»Ÿä¸€ä¸­å¿ƒçº¿: \(centerLineY))")
   333â†’                print("    - ä¿¡æ¯å†…å®¹: \(allTextContent.joined(separator: " | "))")
   334â†’            }
   335â†’        } else {
   336â†’            // ğŸ¨ å…¶ä»–å¸ƒå±€ï¼šæŒ‰åºæ’åˆ—
   337â†’            for content in watermarkContent where !content.isEmpty {
   338â†’                let font = content == watermarkContent.first ? titleFont : lineFont
   339â†’                let textSize = content.size(withAttributes: [.font: font])
   340â†’                
   341â†’                // ğŸ¨ ä½¿ç”¨æ–°çš„ä¿¡æ¯ä½ç½®è®¾ç½®
   342â†’                let textX: CGFloat
   343â†’                switch settings.infoPosition {
   344â†’                case .left:
   345â†’                    textX = leftX
   346â†’                case .right:
   347â†’                    textX = rightX - textSize.width
   348â†’                case .center:
   349â†’                    textX = centerX - textSize.width / 2
   350â†’                }
   351â†’                
   352â†’                drawTextWithShadow(content, 
   353â†’                                 font: font, 
   354â†’                                 at: CGPoint(x: textX, y: currentY), 
   355â†’                                 in: context)
   356â†’                
   357â†’                currentY += lineHeights[lineIndex] + lineSpacing
   358â†’                lineIndex += 1
   359â†’            }
   360â†’            
   361â†’            print("  ğŸ¨ ä¿¡æ¯ç»˜åˆ¶: ä½ç½®=\(settings.infoPosition.displayName), å¸ƒå±€=ç»Ÿä¸€å¸ƒå±€")
   362â†’        }
   363â†’        
   364â†’        context.restoreGState()
   365â†’    }
   366â†’    
   367â†’    // ğŸš€ æ–°å¢ï¼šç®€åŒ–ç‰ˆä¸“ä¸šå‚ç›´æ°´å°ç»˜åˆ¶
   368â†’    private func drawProfessionalVerticalWatermarkSimplified(in rect: CGRect, context: CGContext, settings: WatermarkSettings, captureSettings: CameraCaptureSettings, aspectRatio: AspectRatio?, isLandscape: Bool) {
   369â†’        context.saveGState()
   370â†’        
   371â†’        // ç¡®å®šæœ‰æ•ˆç»˜åˆ¶åŒºåŸŸ
   372â†’        let effectiveRect: CGRect
   373â†’        if let aspectRatio = aspectRatio, aspectRatio != .ratio4_3 {
   374â†’            effectiveRect = aspectRatio.getCropRect(for: rect.size)
   375â†’        } else {
   376â†’            effectiveRect = rect
   377â†’        }
   378â†’        
   379â†’        // è®¡ç®—åŸºæœ¬å‚æ•° - æ¨ªå±é€‚é…
   380â†’        let baseSize = min(effectiveRect.width, effectiveRect.height)
   381â†’        let titleFontSize = baseSize * (isLandscape ? 0.024 : 0.028)
   382â†’        let lineFontSize = baseSize * (isLandscape ? 0.020 : 0.024)
   383â†’        let lineSpacing = baseSize * 0.012
   384â†’        let bottomPadding = baseSize * (isLandscape ? 0.04 : 0.05)
   385â†’        
   386â†’        let titleFont = UIFont.systemFont(ofSize: titleFontSize, weight: .medium)
   387â†’        let lineFont = UIFont.systemFont(ofSize: lineFontSize, weight: .regular)
   388â†’        
   389â†’        // è·å–æ°´å°å†…å®¹
   390â†’        let watermarkContent = buildWatermarkContent(settings: settings, captureSettings: captureSettings)
   391â†’        
   392â†’        // ğŸ¨ åŠ¨æ€å¸ƒå±€ï¼šå½“Logoå’Œä¿¡æ¯åˆ†åˆ«ä½äºå·¦å³æ—¶ï¼Œå„è‡ªå‚ç›´å±…ä¸­
   393â†’        let centerX = effectiveRect.midX
   394â†’        let leftX = effectiveRect.minX + baseSize * 0.05
   395â†’        let rightX = effectiveRect.maxX - baseSize * 0.05
   396â†’        
   397â†’        // ğŸš€ æ£€æŸ¥æ˜¯å¦éœ€è¦å·¦å³åˆ†å¸ƒå¸ƒå±€ï¼ˆç®€åŒ–ç‰ˆæœ¬ï¼‰
   398â†’        let isLeftRightLayout = (settings.logoPosition == .left && settings.infoPosition == .right) ||
   399â†’                               (settings.logoPosition == .right && settings.infoPosition == .left)
   400â†’        
   401â†’        // ç»˜åˆ¶æ–‡å­—è¡Œï¼ˆç®€åŒ–ç‰ˆæœ¬ï¼‰
   402â†’        let allTextContent = watermarkContent.filter { !$0.isEmpty }
   403â†’        if !allTextContent.isEmpty {
   404â†’            if isLeftRightLayout {
   405â†’                // ğŸš€ å·¦å³åˆ†å¸ƒå¸ƒå±€ï¼šä¿¡æ¯æ–‡å­—å‚ç›´å±…ä¸­
   406â†’                var totalTextHeight: CGFloat = 0
   407â†’                for content in allTextContent {
   408â†’                    let font = content == allTextContent.first ? titleFont : lineFont
   409â†’                    totalTextHeight += font.lineHeight
   410â†’                    if content != allTextContent.last {
   411â†’                        totalTextHeight += lineSpacing
   412â†’                    }
   413â†’                }
   414â†’                
   415â†’                // ğŸ¯ ä½¿ç”¨ç»Ÿä¸€ä¸­å¿ƒçº¿è®¡ç®—
   416â†’                let centerLineY = effectiveRect.maxY - bottomPadding / 2
   417â†’                let textStartY = centerLineY - totalTextHeight / 2
   418â†’                var textCurrentY = textStartY
   419â†’                
   420â†’                for content in allTextContent {
   421â†’                    let font = content == allTextContent.first ? titleFont : lineFont
   422â†’                    let textSize = content.size(withAttributes: [.font: font])
   423â†’                    
   424â†’                    let textX: CGFloat
   425â†’                    switch settings.infoPosition {
   426â†’                    case .left:
   427â†’                        textX = leftX
   428â†’                    case .right:
   429â†’                        textX = rightX - textSize.width
   430â†’                    case .center:
   431â†’                        textX = centerX - textSize.width / 2
   432â†’                    }
   433â†’                    
   434â†’                    drawTextSimplified(content,
   435â†’                                     font: font,
   436â†’                                     at: CGPoint(x: textX, y: textCurrentY))
   437â†’                    
   438â†’                    textCurrentY += font.lineHeight + lineSpacing
   439â†’                }
   440â†’            } else {
   441â†’                // ğŸ¨ å…¶ä»–å¸ƒå±€ï¼šç»Ÿä¸€åº•éƒ¨å¯¹é½
   442â†’                let totalHeight = CGFloat(allTextContent.count) * lineFont.lineHeight + CGFloat(allTextContent.count - 1) * lineSpacing
   443â†’                let startY = effectiveRect.maxY - bottomPadding - totalHeight
   444â†’                var currentY = startY
   445â†’                
   446â†’                for content in allTextContent {
   447â†’                    let font = content == allTextContent.first ? titleFont : lineFont
   448â†’                    let textSize = content.size(withAttributes: [.font: font])
   449â†’                    
   450â†’                    let textX: CGFloat
   451â†’                    switch settings.infoPosition {
   452â†’                    case .left:
   453â†’                        textX = leftX
   454â†’                    case .right:
   455â†’                        textX = rightX - textSize.width
   456â†’                    case .center:
   457â†’                        textX = centerX - textSize.width / 2
   458â†’                    }
   459â†’                    
   460â†’                    drawTextSimplified(content,
   461â†’                                     font: font,
   462â†’                                     at: CGPoint(x: textX, y: currentY))
   463â†’                    
   464â†’                    currentY += font.lineHeight + lineSpacing
   465â†’                }
   466â†’            }
   467â†’        }
   468â†’        
   469â†’        context.restoreGState()
   470â†’    }
   471â†’    
   472â†’    // ğŸš€ æ„å»ºæ°´å°å†…å®¹æ•°ç»„ - åŠ¨æ€å†…å®¹ç»“æ„
   473â†’    private func buildWatermarkContent(settings: WatermarkSettings, captureSettings: CameraCaptureSettings) -> [String] {
   474â†’        var content: [String] = []
   475â†’        
   476â†’        // ç¬¬ä¸€ä¼˜å…ˆçº§ï¼šè‡ªå®šä¹‰æ–‡å­—
   477â†’        if !settings.customText.isEmpty {
   478â†’            content.append(settings.customText)
   479â†’        }
   480â†’        
   481â†’        // ç¬¬äºŒä¼˜å…ˆçº§ï¼šè®¾å¤‡å‹å·ï¼ˆä»…å½“ç”¨æˆ·å¼€å¯äº†è®¾å¤‡å¼€å…³æ—¶ï¼‰
   482â†’        if settings.showDeviceModel {
   483â†’            let deviceText = DeviceInfoHelper.getDetailedDeviceModel()
   484â†’            content.append(deviceText)
   485â†’        }
   486â†’        
   487â†’        // ç¬¬ä¸‰ä¼˜å…ˆçº§ï¼šé•œå¤´ä¿¡æ¯ï¼ˆä»…å½“ç”¨æˆ·å¼€å¯äº†ç„¦è·å¼€å…³æ—¶ï¼‰
   488â†’        if settings.showFocalLength {
   489â†’            let lensInfo = buildLensInfo(captureSettings: captureSettings)
   490â†’            if !lensInfo.isEmpty {
   491â†’                content.append(lensInfo)
   492â†’            }
   493â†’        }
   494â†’        
   495â†’        // ç¬¬å››ä¼˜å…ˆçº§ï¼šæ‹æ‘„å‚æ•°ï¼ˆæ ¹æ®ç”¨æˆ·å¼€å¯çš„å¼€å…³åŠ¨æ€ç»„åˆï¼‰
   496â†’        var parameterComponents: [String] = []
   497â†’        
   498â†’        if settings.showAperture {
   499â†’            parameterComponents.append(captureSettings.formattedAperture)
   500â†’        }
   501â†’        
   502â†’        if settings.showShutterSpeed {
   503â†’            parameterComponents.append(captureSettings.formattedShutterSpeed)
   504â†’        }
   505â†’        
   506â†’        if settings.showISO {
   507â†’            parameterComponents.append(captureSettings.formattedISO)
   508â†’        }
   509â†’        
   510â†’        if settings.showDate {
   511â†’            let formatter = DateFormatter()
   512â†’            formatter.dateFormat = "yyyy.MM.dd"
   513â†’            parameterComponents.append(formatter.string(from: captureSettings.timestamp))
   514â†’        }
   515â†’        
   516â†’        if settings.showTimeStamp {
   517â†’            let formatter = DateFormatter()
   518â†’            formatter.dateFormat = "HH:mm:ss"
   519â†’            parameterComponents.append(formatter.string(from: captureSettings.timestamp))
   520â†’        }
   521â†’        
   522â†’        // å¦‚æœæœ‰æ‹æ‘„å‚æ•°ï¼Œç»„åˆæˆä¸€è¡Œ
   523â†’        if !parameterComponents.isEmpty {
   524â†’            let parametersLine = parameterComponents.joined(separator: " / ")
   525â†’            content.append(parametersLine)
   526â†’        }
   527â†’        
   528â†’        print("  ğŸ”§ åŠ¨æ€æ°´å°å†…å®¹æ„å»ºå®Œæˆï¼š")
   529â†’        print("    å¼€å…³çŠ¶æ€æ£€æŸ¥:")
   530â†’        print("      - showDeviceModel: \(settings.showDeviceModel)")
